entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
